New Records: Brent Rooker became the first A's player with at least 100 RBIs in a single season since Matt Olson
Key Match Events: Kyle McCann hit a two-run homer, and Brent Rooker had two hits and two RBIs to help the Athletics beat the Astros 5-4
Jose Altuve exited the game with right side discomfort
Kyle Tucker hit an RBI single in the eighth to cut the deficit to one
Pre-Game Insights: The Astros have lost three straight games and their lead in the AL West has narrowed to four games over Seattle with 17 to play
Post-Match Reflections: The Athletics' win continues their trend of playing spoiler to contending teams
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lawrence Butler extended his hitting streak to 19 games with a single in the fifth
The Astros' loss was their third straight, and their lead in the AL West has narrowed to four games
Others: Ross Stripling was placed on the 15-day injured list retroactive to Monday with a lower back strain
Framber Valdez (14-6, 2.97 ERA) starts opposite Athletics RHP Mitch Spence (7-9, 4.42 ERA) in the series finale Thursday
